      • validateNut

        public static void validateNut(String correlator,
                               SqrlNutToken nutToken,
                               SqrlConfig config,
                               SqrlPersistence sqrlPersistence,
                               SqrlTif.TifBuilder tifBuilder)
                        throws SqrlException
        Validates the SqrlNutToken from the SqrlClientRequest by:
      • 1. check the timestamp embedded in the Nut has expired
      • 2. call SqrlPersistence to see if the Nut has been replayed
Parameters:
correlator -
nutToken - the Nut to be validated
tifBuilder -
Throws:
SqrlException - if any validation fails or if persistence fails

  • computeNutExpiresAt

    public static long computeNutExpiresAt(SqrlNutToken nutToken,
                                       SqrlConfig config)
    Computes when a given SQRL "nut" nonce token will expire
    Parameters:
    nutToken - the token for which expiration time will be computed
    config - the SQRL config
    Returns:
    the time, in millis, when the token will expire
